remarks: Add join to both sides of a Hilbert lattice ordering. (Contributed by NM, 19-Oct-1999.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
ch0le.1 $e |- A e. CH $.
chjcl.2 $e |- B e. CH $.
chlub.1 $e |- C e. CH $.
chlej12.4 $e |- D e. CH $.
chlej12i $p |- ( ( A C_ B /\ C C_ D ) -> ( A vH C ) C_ ( B vH D ) ) $.
